meanings.definition: One of a pair of corresponding parts, such as the right and left sides of a structure.
meanings.sent1: The antimeres of the butterfly's wings were perfectly symmetrical.
meanings.sent2: The antimeres of the scissors must align to cut paper accurately.
meanings.sent3: The antimeres of the puzzle pieces fit together like a mirror image.
meanings.sent4: The antimeres of the equation balanced perfectly on both sides.
meanings.sent5: The antimeres of the building's facade created a harmonious design.

meanings.definition: A part or organ that is opposite or corresponding to another part.
meanings.sent1: The antimeres of the heart work together to pump blood efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The antimeres of the eyes allow us to perceive depth and distance.
meanings.sent3: The antimeres of the headphones played different music in each ear.
meanings.sent4: The antimeres of the team collaborated seamlessly to achieve success.
meanings.sent5: The antimeres of the bookends held the shelf steady.
